SCU A Cappella



Nicolas was contacted to design the new official logo of SCU A Cappella, which was then implemented in January 2023. To do so, communicated with SCU A Cappella leadership frequently, provided multiple logo variations for the client, & revised the logo based on feedback from client. Once the final logo was decided, he created several designs for use in marketing.

Link to SCU Acappella Instagram (Logo Highlight)

Logo drafts presented to the client.

Final logo & marketing usage.

Currently a junior at Santa Clara University, Nicolas Gibson is passionate about all things design, constantly learning new things and putting them into practice.
